title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland (Part 1)
description: Readers are introduced to young Alice. After falling down a rabbit hole, Alice finds herself in a bizarre world filled with many unusual creatures. She discovers the power of Wonderland food and drink, its effect on her physical size, and how to use it to her advantage.
meta: Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the story
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast settings, characters, and events in the story
Superlative Adjectives : Identify and use superlative adjectives
Similes and Metaphors : Identify and understand similes and metaphors
